original_text: And they went about in Judah, and gathered the Levites out of all the cities of Judah, and the chief of the fathers of Israel, and they came to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 그들이 유다를 두루 다니며 유다 모든 고을에서 레위 사람들과 이스라엘 족장들을 모아 예루살렘에 이른지라

sentences.original_text: And they went about in Judah
out of all the cities of Judah
and the chief of the fathers of Israel
